rows.label: qev042102_MSG0001
rows.name: ...Ganglion threat to wipe out Drongo Caravan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0002
rows.name:
Lularita not heard of anything like that.
Who told friend such crazy story?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0003
rows.name:
Lularita smell something fishy here. And if whoever
said that is taking something from friend as result...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0004
rows.name:
then Lularita, greatest warrior in Drongo Caravan,
will have something to say about it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Hmmm... Nalu is acting awfully smug lately.
Wonder what has her so happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0006
rows.name:
Nalu is the type who would do anything to get ahead
in business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0007
rows.name:
Lularita is bit worried, to be honest.
Has human friend heard anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_JNK0010
rows.name: Report

rows.label: qev042102_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Lularita all about Nalu's request.

rows.label: qev042102_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev042102_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask to hear more about Nalu's past misdeeds.

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0008
rows.name: Ganglion are threatening to kill Drongo Caravan?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0009
rows.name:
So friend brought Nalu a bunch of human tech?!
Meh-meh-meh-meeeeeeh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh, selling food to hungry travelers at ridiculously
inflated prices... Pawning off cheap glass as rare and
precious sparklies... [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0011
rows.name: Friend knows. Nasty things like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0012
rows.name:
Many Nopon claim that Nalu is still doing business
with Ganglion, even though it was outlawed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0013
rows.name: ...WHAAAAT?! Nalu has been asking friend for favors?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0014
rows.name:
...In order to save Drongo Caravan from being wiped
out by Ganglion?! Meh-meh-meeeeh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0015
rows.name: Lularita not heard of anything like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0016
rows.name:
...Ten to one, Nalu is selling what friend brought to
Ganglion and making tidy profit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0017
rows.name:
That little scumbag Nalu need to be taught serious
lesson![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0018
rows.name:
On top of A-HAB autonomous AI and Nostalgia L-002
units Nalu asked for, Lularita have one small request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0019
rows.name: Can friend catch whole bunch of bullet flies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0020
rows.name:
Lularita will rig them up so when Nalu make hand-off
to Ganglion...BOOM! They fly everywhere and scare
pants off those who are wearing pants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0021
rows.name:
Does friend mind? Nalu needs to learn what happens
to those who pull schemes in Drongo Caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0022
rows.name:
Bullet flies are like the name suggests:
dangerous bugs that zip around like bullets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0023
rows.name:
Lularita will pack them into bug bomb Nalu and those
Ganglion never forget.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0024
rows.name:
Lularita will wait here for friend to find A-HAB
autonomous AI unit, Nostalgia L-002 units,
and whooole lot of bullet flies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0025
rows.name:
How goes searching?
Did friend find what Nalu wanted?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0026
rows.name: ...Along with whole BUNCH of bullet flies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0027
rows.name:
Ha HA! With this many bullet flies, Lularita can make
HUGE bug bomb![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0028
rows.name:
Just one minute now. Lularita has been making these
since childhood. Ah, such memories...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0029
rows.name:
La dee da tee dum... Take bug, wrap it snug...
Dee dum da daa...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0030
rows.name:
...Done! Now when no-good Nalu hand these over
to Ganglion...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0031
rows.name:
BLAMMO! Wrapping will burst and it will be hailstorm
of angry bullet flies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0032
rows.name:
It will be scene straight out of heck! Hee hee!
...Here then. It is ready to go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0033
rows.name:
Nalu is going to regret doing business with Ganglion.
That much Lularita can guarantee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0034
rows.name:
Lularita can picture scene when Nalu hands over goods
rigged with bug bomb to Ganglion...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0035
rows.name: Just thinking about it has Lularita giggling![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev042102_MSG0036
rows.name:
Heh. Evil never prosper. Lularita will preserve peace
in Drongo Caravan forever.[ST:wait ]
